thread.title: Brexit will go ahead. But what happens when the young want to take their country back?
thread.title_full: Brexit will go ahead. But what happens when the young want to take their country back?

author: Michael Deacon
title: Brexit will go ahead. But what happens when the young want to take their country back?
text:
H ere’s a thought. Probably the most popular argument for Brexit , particularly among older voters, was that it would let us “take our country back”.
But what if, when today’s young are old, they decide to take their country back?
SCENE: a pub, 60 years from now…
Pensioner 1: Tell you what, Ethan old son, this country’s gone to the dogs. I barely recognise it any more.
Pensioner 2: How d’you mean, Oscar?
Pensioner 1: Look at this packet of roasted peanuts. “Three ounces”, it says here. Ounces indeed. What exactly is an ounce, anyway? I’ve never got used to these new-fangled imperial measurements. They should go back to grams and kilograms. You knew where you were with grams and kilograms.
Pensioner 2: You’re not wrong. Metric was much better. Divide everything by 100, not 12 or 14 or 16 or silly numbers like that. It’s just common sense. I was watching the athletics on telly last night. Know...
